devdoc.details: Smart contract for storing Monad Runner game data on-chain,      including registration of a smart account for account abstraction.

getPlayerCount().details: Get total number of registered players.

getPlayerRank(address).details: Get a player's rank on the leaderboard.

returns._0: Player rank (1-based) or 0 if not on leaderboard.

params.count: Number of top scores to retrieve.

registerPlayer(string).details: Register a new player with a username.

registerSmartAccount(address).details: Register the smart account address associated with a player's EOA.

storeReplayDataHash(bytes32).details: Store replay data hash - allows verification of off-chain replay data.

devdoc.title: MonadRunnerGame
